title: LIDER Brushed Black Minimalist Design Decorator Switch, Frameless Paddle Wall Light Switch, On/Off Rocker Switch, Single Pole, Residential Grade, UL Listed, 3 Wire, 15A 120-277VAC, 5 Pack

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #168,430 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #520 in Electrical Light Switches       #520 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Perfect Fit and Color Match - LIDER matte finish switches are compatible with a wide range of decorator-style wall plates from a variety of brands, but LIDER products should be used to ensure the perfect fit and color match.

Tough and Heat Resistant - LIDER light switches are made from Polycarbonate Thermoplastic for durability, longevity, and heat/fading resistance. This device has a flammability UL94, V2 rating that protects against high temperatures that cause discoloration and fading over time.

Easy Installation - LIDER switches are residential grade and an easy replacement for residential areas like houses, condos, apartments, and many commercial areas such as offices, hotels, and high-end businesses. It has a shallow body design that fits standard junction boxes. Easy to install with clamp-type back insert wiring for fast, simple push-in wiring (copper only). The light control device dimensions are 1.40” width x 2.76” height x 1.07” depth.
Modern and Sophisticated - LIDER light switches are available in a striking range of colors with a matte finish to bring a modern, sophisticated look to any application.

Safe and Reliable - LIDER decorator switches are built with safety in mind; featuring 15A 120-277VAC, single pole only; break-off plaster ears; grounding screw; wiring instructions included; and UL listed quality. Wall plate sold separately. Enjoy a 1-year warranty for added peace of mind.

customers_say: Customers find the switch easy to install and consider it good value for money.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product, would recommend
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are as advertised and straightforward to install. They’ve held up well in the few months we’ve had them. Color is as advertised.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat value, clean look
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Great look.  Better price.  Clean and smooth.

customer_reviews.rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars4.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are builder grade 3-way paddle light switches and the cover plates are not included. They are decent quality but not great, definitely not top grade and they have a lightweight tactile feel to them. They work correctly for me, so far. One of my pet peeves is the cheaper quality of the screw terminals.  The picture shows that on this switch the terminal connector is just a single clamp screw, while better-quality devices have a clamping plate which allows placing 2 wires under the plate.  Per the National Electric Code, there can only be 1 wire attached under each screw head, so these switches are somewhat less convenient to use in a busy electrical box. These are OK 3-way paddle switches, not the best but acceptable if you don't require the best quality.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet:
The media could not be loaded.
                
            
                
            
            
        
    
    








  
  
    I used this switch plate set to replace the old one in my laundry room. I have the brushed black Samsung Washer/ Dryer set. I had ordered this type of plate from others and had to return...quality issues. These are flawless and are a good value for the money. They are easy to install. They have the screws and the holes in the back. My old switch had some wires in the hole and some on the screw...I kept the same configuration using these. They look expensive and functionality is easy ....top part is on and bottom part is off. I have ordered 2 packs of these as I am redoing my whole house..the outlets and wall switches.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Easy to use/install. Only wished they had WAGO connectors instead of screw and stab terminals.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2024

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSolid Switch, Sturdy Thread on Screws, Has Hole for Easy Connection, Great Price!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These Lider 3-way switches are excellent quality and are delivered in 10 individual boxes. The white matt color is very attractive. These switches are made for those of us who don't favor bright white. The 4 screws on the switches are good quality with strong threads that don't refuse to screw in when needed.  I rated 5 stars on easy to install but 3-way switches are a challenge to install and take a lot of thinking.  The directions actually make sense, which is rare, so the installation should be no problem. I will spend the extra money and purchase the wire that is made for hooking up 3-way switches. Running an extra wire and trying to just figure out what went where nearly put me under on the last house I built. An electrician I am not but I have studied and know how to wire a house and successfully carried that task out a couple of times (other than the 3-way switches, I had to call the posse for help wiring them in). I do appreciate having these switches and the logical instructions that were included. We are in the process of building our house, so I haven't installed these switches yet. In comparison to box stores this box of switches costs $16.81 less than the same item at the big L. Don't hesitate to purchase these switches. They are top quality.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: It feels very lightweight, even for a light switch. Also the plastic front feels cheap. The worst part, though, is the loud click the switch makes whenever you turn it off or on. That part was the deal-breaker for me.
